pages.text: The $(thing)Fuel Catalyzer$() is an augment that increases the amount of energy a dynamo generates from each unit of fuel. Each installed catalyzer will increase energy output by +15%. (multiple can be installed)

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Raw materials required: 1 $(item)Electrum Ingot$(), 2 $(item)Redstone$() and 4 $(item)Lead Ingots$().
